snippet: Barclays announced on Monday that it has combined its corporate coverage and deal-making teams into a new "corporate finance mergers and acquisitions group," according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.
abstract: Barclays announced on Monday that it has combined its corporate coverage and deal-making teams into a new "corporate finance mergers and acquisitions group," according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Barclays Unites Corporate Finance and Deal Teams
